mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id, u.name, u.email, u.phone, u.position, u.dept_id AS user_dept_id, d.name AS user_dept_name, dp.dept_id AS privilege_dept_id, d2.name AS privilege_dept_name, dp.privilege_date FROM user u LEFT JOIN dept_privilege dp ON u.user_id = dp.user_id LEFT JOIN dept d ON u.dept_id = d.dept_id LEFT JOIN dept d2 ON dp.dept_id = d2.dept_id WHERE dp.dept_id IS NOT NULL;

SELECT u.user_id, u.name, u.email, u.phone, u.position, u.dept_id AS user_dept_id, d.name AS user_dept_name, dp.dept_id AS privilege_dept_id, d2.name AS privilege_dept_name, dp.privilege_date FROM user u LEFT JOIN dept_privilege dp ON u.user_id = dp.user_id LEFT JOIN dept d ON u.dept_id = d.dept_id LEFT JOIN dept d2 ON dp.dept_id = d2.dept_id WHERE u.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') AND dp.dept_id IS NOT NULL;
